alert.note: Alert for Cass; Lancaster; Sarpy; Saunders (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 04 at 7:39PM CDT until July 04 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 800 PM CDT FOR WESTERN SARPY...SOUTHEASTERN LANCASTER...NORTHWESTERN OTOE... SOUTHEASTERN SAUNDERS AND CASS COUNTIES... At 738 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 2 miles southwest of Wehrspann Lake to 2 miles southwest of Louisville to near Elmwood to 4 miles northeast of Palmyra to 3 miles southeast of Hickman, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Public. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. These severe storms will be near... Weeping Water, Unadilla, Avoca and Douglas around 750 PM CDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
